title: Kled's remount speed is retarded
body: This really needs to be slowed down. Trying to even play the game against him as a tank is one of the dumbest things in the game.

replies.body: I would invite you to play kled and see how fun it is to die .2 seconds before remounting.
But that would remove Kled support as an option! i need to poop on ADC's and supports who think hard cc can lock anyone down D:

Wow, there's people playing Kled?

I thought they're just Yasuo/Riven instalockers in this League world.
iv died tont of times just becausr it was 0.25 late lol

>Trying to even play the game against him as a tank is one of the dumbest things in the game.

You are starting to sound like the whiny ADCs that cry about Tanks.
Kinda funny tbh.
